resources.string: This Xposed module will broadcast an intent whenever the key phrase \"Ok, google now\" is recognised by Motorola\'s Touchless Controls app.
Simply listen for an intent with the action: \"com.hawkjm.okgooglenowtriggerintent.AUDIO_TRIGGER\" in Tasker or any other intent receiver of your choice.
The default actions are blocked, so you\'ll need to handle any additional desired voice input.
